info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 10 at 12:02AM EDT until June 10 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Columbia SC
info.description:
* WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...Portions of east central Georgia, including the following counties, Burke and Richmond and central South Carolina, including the following counties, Aiken and Barnwell.
* WHEN...Until 200 AM EDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1202 AM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Waynesboro, Savannah River Site, Hephzibah, Williston, New Ellenton, Jackson, McBean, Augusta Regional Airport, Gough, Blythe, Keysville, Elko, Vidette, Bennock Mill, Audubon's Silver Bluff Sanctuary, Shell Bluff Landing, Shell Bluff, New Savannah Bluff Lock & Dam Park, Savannah River Site Badge Office and Savannah River Site H Canyon. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Most flooding deaths occur in vehicles. Never drive through a flooded roadway or around barricades. Turn around, don't drown.
Flooded roadways are nearly impossible to see at night. Avoid traveling in this area. Turn around, don't drown.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM EDT EARLY THIS MORNING

area.areaDesc: Burke, GA; Richmond, GA; Aiken, SC; Barnwell, SC
